channel.title: Hiring Programmers from Outside the RSC Community
channel.description: Why hasn't anyone done this? It just seems like most coders left in the community are incompetent, corrupt, or mentally ill. So why hasn't a anyone hired an outside professional programmer?

item.title: Hiring Programmers from Outside the RSC Community
item.dc:creator: @Kaibutzu Kaibutzu
item.description:
@Kaibutzu wrote:

if anyone wanted to get a real person to code for them that person would do it right and do it all over, java is crap

Read full topic
item.source: Hiring Programmers from Outside the RSC Community

item.title: Hiring Programmers from Outside the RSC Community
item.dc:creator: @Fabrice_L Fabrice L
item.description:
@Fabrice_L wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:4, topic:553167”]You’ll pay them just to learn the code base, how the client works etc. You’ll be in a good amount before they even start coding.

Plus devs here usually do things for themselves. If I want something, I make it.[/quote]

^^ that

Read full topic

item.title: Hiring Programmers from Outside the RSC Community
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

You’ll pay them just to learn the code base, how the client works etc. You’ll be in a good amount before they even start coding.

Plus devs here usually do things for themselves. If I want something, I make it.

item.title: Hiring Programmers from Outside the RSC Community
item.dc:creator: @my-swagger my-swagger
item.description:
@my-swagger wrote:

Why would you hire anybody when you can do it yourself? I wouldn’t really pay for something that isn’t going to benifit me in the long run anyway.

Read full topic
item.source: Hiring Programmers from Outside the RSC Community

item.title: Hiring Programmers from Outside the RSC Community
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

Because you’ll either get an incompetent Indian guy or need to take out a second mortgage on your house.
